value_i18n.en_US: Every piece of information is encrypted with advanced, highest-security encryption algorithms
We never share or sell your personal information outside of our organization.
ITM comes standard with every Pillar account. Not only do we protect your identity, we actively monitor for identity theft.
We take security seriously. Read about our standards and practices in our detailed security document.

Pillar Bank is a legacy built by Thomas and Clyde Rossman in 1849. One of the only major US banks founded in California, Pillar became the first private bank to offer wealth management services to people during the gold rush, managing the modern equivalent of 82 billion in private assets.
Today, we hold the same values as we did 170 years ago with even more expertise, experienced advisors, and modern technology to make wealth management simple and effective.
Open an account online in three minutes or visit one of our locations to open an account with an advisors.
